=jSSC-0.7 examples=

==Writing data to serial port==

{{{

import jssc.SerialPort;
import jssc.SerialPortException;

public class Main {

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        SerialPort serialPort = new SerialPort("COM1");
        try {
            serialPort.openPort();//Opening serial port
            serialPort.setParams(SerialPort.BAUDRATE_9600, 
                                 SerialPort.DATABITS_8,
                                 SerialPort.STOPBITS_1,
                                 SerialPort.PARITY_NONE);//Setting params, also you can set params by this string: serialPort.setParams(9600, 8, 1, 0);
            serialPort.writeBytes("This is a test string".getBytes());//Writing data to port
            serialPort.closePort();//Closing port
        }
        catch (SerialPortException ex) {
            System.out.println(ex);
        }
    }
}

}}}
